content.detailedDescription: I posted an event about two years ago and was mailed a package asking me to further describe the event but i was too scared to actually do so.  please recontact me.  i will fill out everything you send.
content.summary: I filled out a description about two years ago.  its already posted.  please contact me.

content.detailedDescription: While i came from manhattan on the bus (nj transit bus - 163), i saw a magnificent view of cloud in the sky.  i wanted to catch that moment of the sight;hence, iused my ipod touch to take a photo of it. of course, the bus was moving.  after i took several times, i checked the photos. on two photos, i noticed something that is flashed on my picutres.  i was surprised that i took such picutures.  the ufo-like object descend little bit as compare the first photo with the second photo.
content.summary: I took a picture of cloud, but i saw a light on the photo i took

content.detailedDescription: This is the second day in a row this object hovered in our area at around 7:00 pm both days.  i thought it was a star the first day, then filmed it the second, and to my surprise, it barely moved and dissapeared out of thin air.  i attached a video of it.  at the 1:30 mark you can see it fade, if you do not want to watch the whole film.
content.summary: Daytime ufo orb drone

content.detailedDescription: I had stepped out side because i had heard a sound that resembled distant thunder and looked up expecting a cloudy sky, but it is a clear night and right at the top of the tree line there was a large trianguler object with bright lights at each point and a blinking red light in the center. i could also see the outline of the craft against the night sky which allowed me to see the bottom surface of this craft. i had no idea what it was, and the red light made me think it might have been military or some kind of plain and soon after there were planes that began to circle as the craft drifted out of sight going from east to west.
content.summary: Observed a lazrg trianguliar craft with lights at each point with a red strobing light in the center

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 3:18 pm was leaving work. as i neared parkway i glanced up and to my right and noticed a fast moving bright object approximately 1-2 miles up. object appeared to be disc shaped and traveling at least twice as fast as a conventional jetliner. i initially thought that it was an airliner as i have seen them shine in the bright sunlight. however this object appeared to be approximately twice the size of a 747. sun was bright and sky was deep blue. a few small thick white clouds were scattered about. the object traveled what looked to be a couple 100 yards and straight into one of these clouds. i watched for object to emerge so as to make a positive id but the object did not emerge. i continued to observe this cloud for another 5-6 miles travel time with nothing emerging from it.
content.summary: Silvery object (larger than conventional aircraft), dissapears behind cloud.

content.detailedDescription:
Metallic like cigar object what appears to have some shining metallic look to it. object traveled south of orange ca at a constant speed for 15 seconds or so and then disappeared from sight.  object was moving in a straight line. 

1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?
saw a metallic like cigar shape object from my car (front window) while i was traveling south on tustin ave in orange ca.

2. what made you first notice the object?
noticed the object in the sky while i was at a stop light off of tustin ave because it has a shining or has glittering metallic look to it. seemed a bit odd since it look like a stick or cigar shape object that was moving at a constant speed but quite fast considering how far away it was. it left no smoke trail and doesn't appear to have any wings.  the object looks out of place.  i usually see airplanes flying across the sky in this area since we're near john wayne airport, so i can tell this object looks different.  i also know it's not a jet since i know what jets look like because i used to see them all the time because i grew up in san diego near the mira mar air base.

3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?
i didn't think much, just thought it was weird since it has a shiny look to it.  i guess i wondering how come it traveled pretty fast for it being far away.

4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail.
object appears to be moving at a constant speed traveling in a straight line. it appears to have a shiny metallic look, but i can tell the shape looks like a cigar.

5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.
thought it was a weird looking object, it seemed very long for being an airplane. i kept staring at it just cause it looked out of place.  object then vanished after about 15 seconds that i noticed it traveling at a constant speed and in a straight line.

6. how did you lose sight of the object?
it disappeared from sight, i stuck my head out of the car to make sure where it go and could not see it anymore.
content.summary: Metallic like cigar shape traveled south of orange ca at a constant speed for 15 seconds then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was walking home at about 10pm and just looked up and there it was, a really big and bright star, but there were no other stars because of thick cloud cover.  then, it just took off flying to the north and it was simply gone. it looked like a super bright white baseball being thrown fast and high in the sky. i had no real feelings about seeing this thing other than i wished someone else could have seen it with me.  if it is one of our secret aircrafts, we have some really cool stuff!
content.summary: It looked like a big bright star, but there were no other stars b/c of thick cloud cover.  then, it just took off flying to the north and it was simply gone.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my deck, facing south, looking at the sky at 5am. i noticed a white ball of light moving out of the west, heading east to southeast a 5:06am.  as the light grew closer, it had a white glow but no other lights on the object.  there were no blinking lights as you would see on wings or a tail if it were a plane.  when the object got close it disappeared behind some trees directly behind my house. i realized that the object made no noise at all. i could hear traffic from the highway picking up a bit, from about a mile away so i thought it was strange to not hear anything when the white object passed.  i first noticed it because it was very bright and there no other objects moving in the sky. i assumed it was a plane.
content.summary: Bright ball of light m oving from west to east southeast

content.detailedDescription:
This series of incidents took place in temecula, ca in late 2004/early 2005.

i was around 16 years old and attended a local high school, temecula valley high. my family lived in a subdivision across the street from the town's walmart supercenter (classy, i know). it was, i believe, my sophomore year of high school and my parents had recently decided that i was being a little mooch expecting rides to school, and henceforth made me walk the mile and a half uphill to school every morning. in those days i was admittedly a big ufo nerd. i read the cheap "non-fiction" paperback books and gobbled up the silly, portentous alien "documentaries" on tv. i state this upfront to admit that there was probably a bias at the time to the sightings i am relating here, as i want to be as factual as possible.

i started walking to school each morning at around 6:30am (it took a good 45 minutes for me to get there, and i was always early). the sun would just be rising up over the hills when i'd get going, and some mornings i would see little lights rise up from behind the hills far in the distance, sometimes two at a time. some mornings i could have sworn i'd seen them flying low over distant parts of the subdivision, but to be honest that was probably me being paranoid and silly, and the lights rising up in the mornings were probably planes or helicopters from a nearby port that my eager little mind wanted to be something more.

however, what i started seeing later was certainly no plane, or probably even an aircraft.

some time later in the schoolyear, on my morning walks i would look up at the exact same spot on my route and, for a split second, see a bright light, like a powerful star, hovering at the same spot of sky. as soon as i glimpsed it, it would always "wink out" in a matter of moments. this happened nearly every morning, after sunrise with the sun already well up, at more or less the exact same spot on the road behind the town's home depot, adjacent to a baseball field. on google maps, the coordinates for the exact spot are: (coordinates removed to investigator field) cms flg 08/16/11 21:40

this was not a streetlight, it was not a case of sun glare, and it was not a reflection off a passing plane--even though i am sure that's what the skeptical explanation would be. the light never moved, it was always perfectly stationary high up against the morning blue sky. the way it winked out was comparable to when one stares up at a spotlight that is abruptly turned off: the light seemed to swiftly implode into itself in a matter of nanoseconds. i was never exactly frightened by this apparition (not until later, anyway), but i did feel a mix of curiosity and anxiety. odd as it sounds, it felt like every morning i was playing hide and seek with this thing--i would round the same bend after dawn and think to myself "i'm going to see you, i'm going to see you!" and sure enough, the instant i looked up i would catch a glimpse of it just before it winked out.

i don't remember how long this went on for--a few weeks, possibly a month. the final appearance of this thing that i distinctly remember was the most dramatic, and which put to rest any doubts that what i had been encountering in the mornings was something genuinely unexplained. i went on my morning walk exactly as i had almost a hundred times before. i rounded the little bend behind the home depot, and looked up expecting to see the thing--but there was nothing there. this was not uncommon, as some mornings it did not appear. i didn't think much of it until i reached the spot where the bend connected to the main highway: i somehow felt that the "thing" was near me, watching. i stopped cold on the sidewalk, and looked directly above. it was hovering straight over my head, obscured slightly by a low hanging cloud or fog--a big white sphere of light, perfectly round. i could not judge the distance it was above me because i was *terrified.* as with every time before, i saw it for only a few split seconds, and then it winked out over my head, gone. i ran up the hill about a hundred meters, adrenaline pumping, before i got tired and stopped to gasp for breath. i looked back, but it was gone, of course. the skeptical explanation will be "it was the sun through the clouds, and you mistook it for something else." not so, as at the time the sun was still well in the east, and certainly far from a position directly above where i was standing.

i do not remember ever seeing it again after that incident, even though i still made the same walk to school every morning (although i did so with a heightened level of nervousness!) oddly enough, after that last sighting i pretty much lost all interest in ufos. i realized that the extraterrestrial hypothesis was ridiculous and made no sense in the context of what i experienced--why would beings from across the galaxy fly all the way to earth to play peek-a-boo with a chubby high school girl?

i try not to draw any conclusions about what it was. the furthest i will go is saying that i definitely believe that whatever it was, it was intelligent (well, it seemed to be at least) and not of human origin. if i were being fanciful, i might even say that it had a sense of humor, scaring me and all that last time. i do not believe it was any kind of craft or machine--at no time did i see any mechanical body associated with the light. it just seemed to be a huge, white orb. i make no assumptions about its motives, either.

i have lived around the world since then, and i must say with a tinge of disappointment that i have never seen anything like it again, although i do look up every so often, vainly hoping.
content.summary: Mysterious bright light in the sky reappeared every other morning before winking out when noticed.

content.detailedDescription: While waiting with wife  for  ride to  work  for wife  ,,  i  watched  what i  thought was plane on  approch  to  airport  ,,  or maby  mars   , as it had a  faint  redish  glow  ,,,,,  but it  just  slowly  kept  acending   then  all of a sudden , was gone  lights went out  or  someting   , like it  whent into a door  or  something  ,,,  im  64   no  drugs  ,    im  not  deranged  ,,  was a shock to see.The light  just  went out  zap   gone  and  there was nothing  to be seen    in  any  direction  ,,, yes were  near  the airport   ,  was about 630  am   sunrise  ,,,, that is my  report  ,,,,,  good  day  mmiii
content.summary: Saw  riseing light   at sunrise today  ,,  then  light went out  or it just  was not  there

content.detailedDescription:
At 9.30 in the evening i went out on my deck which faces north and east to call my cat in for the night. it was raining all day and now it was just drizzling lightly. cloud cover was heavy with no stars or moon to be seen.
a round orange ball caught my eye it was very bright and distinct first i thought maybe a search light but it was bright orange and continued on a north to south straight path and it was traveling faster than a plane and i could see no landing lights or any lights. i followed it visually then lost it when it went behind large trees. i then ran to my bedroom which faces southwest but could not see it. i call'ed my daughter right away and told her. i thought of getting my neighbor or camera but there was not time i did not want to loose sight of it. i was very excited in a good way and of course i am still thinking about it.
content.summary: Orange glowing orb went past my house

content.detailedDescription: I stepped out on our deck to look at the nearly full moon rising at about 9:45 pm on a nearly cloudless night and noticed a stationary bright white light (like a brighter than normal venus) to the east at about 60 degrees.  after about 5 seconds the light faded to a star-like point of light and began moving south at around the speed of a near-earth satellite and i dismissed what i'd seen as a tumbling satellite reflecting sunlight except the initial bright light seemed stationary.  alternatively, it could have been a plane changing direction but no flashing running lights were apparent.  however, after the light had traveled about 1 ��� inches at arms length it appeared to suddenly divide into two faint points that went in nearly opposite directions (north and south) at very high rates of speed. since the star-like lights were small and moon lite the sky the lights quickly disappeared from view.
content.summary: Stationary bright planet-like light at 60 degrees faded to star-like point and moved south like a satellite; from it 2 light points went in nearly opposite directions at high speed

content.detailedDescription: I made an earlier report today about object we saw at 7:20 pm. after we saw that object i came inside to file the report, then went back outside with my husband onto the side porch. this was about 8:15 pm. the sky was still clear and blue, not dark yet at all. an object caught my eye in the sky and i pointed it out to him. we both saw an object that was basically the same as the first one we saw, moving in the exact opposite direction, as if it were the same object we saw earlier returning from wherever it had gone. the object was cigar shaped, about the size of an long ibuprofen pill. it was bright white, as if made of glowing white light, with a dark spot in the center. my husband grabbed the binoculars and we both saw that this time there were not flames coming out of one end, but when we saw it earlier it definately appeared to have flames coming out as if propelled by them. it was moving to the southwest, towards the general area of yale. we watched it for about 4 mins, and it got smaller and smaller as if moving farther away. we lost sight of it once it passed the treeline, by this time it was quite small. my husband and i are both educated, sober, healthy and solid of mind. we know what most "normal" things in the sky look like. this had no wings. it was not an airplane. i know it is possible that this object was metallic, and reflecting light from the sun, and that is why it appeared so brightly white. however it did not seem metallic or manmade to me whatsoever,  it seemed to be made of white light. if it was manmade, it was of some material i am not aware of. a few hours ago i was searching youtube for "cigar shaped ufo's", and i was surprised to see videos posted that looked exactly like what we saw. i have seen a stealth bomber fly through the sky before, and they appear quite otherworldy and totally silent, eerie. i know that the government and armed forces most likely have/are testing new technologies and crafts that we the public aren't aware of yet. perhaps this cigar shaped thing is one of those? i do not know, but it was most definately unidentified and unexplained, and quite exhilirating to see.
content.summary: 2nd sighting today of a bright white cigar shaped object with dark center

content.detailedDescription:
My family and i just returned home from a 4th of july bbq.As my family went inside, my son and i we're gettig the rest of our things out of the car when something in the night sky caught my attention, i glanced up at the mountains and saw lights in the sky that look unusual.I thought at first it was a blimp or maybe a laser light show or something, but how could they accomplish what i was about to see when i focused in on the ufo. i was astonished what i was looking at, it was the most amazing thing i ever saw. to acually see a ufo sighting so close to view, i was just in aw!
the ufo look somewhat transparent with small white lights in the center of the ufo that made a circular pattern which looked like one big light and we're the biggest of the lights on the ufo and had many other smaller lights on each side that ran parallel to the ufo, but not in sequence. some white, blue ,orange, green and perhaps other colors i could not determan since i am somewhat color blind. the ufo stayed in one position for quite some time huvering over the san bernardino mountains.
 i spent about 20 minutes looking at it until i decided to go inside the house,who would believe me anyways? i asked my son if he remembered that night but does not remember, since he was somewhat intoxicated that night and told me he somewhat recalls seeing something but really to his knowlege he does not remember. unfortunately i did not have my video camera on hand, since it was not charged. i could see the entire ufo in plain sight, i never thought in my whole life i would see something so amazing as that. so the real question is was it a ufo or was it militry or what? but i tell you one thing, i know what i saw and it looked as real as can be and i would be willing to take a lie detector test, because i know for fact it was real and was truely amazing and unexplainable. i only have the memory of what the ufo looked like, i wish i had more evidence but i don't i'm afraid.Do i believe in ufo's yes, but my friends and family think that i am just crazy when i bring the subject up. no i'm not crazy,i do believe they are out there. i'm hoping to see another sighting over the mountains and hopfully i will have my camera in hand next time!
content.summary: Could see outline of ufo, it was huge. looked transparent like, had many lights, amazing to acually see the entire ufo up close, unreal!,, yeah, but who will believe me

content.detailedDescription: Around augist eigth me my sister and her husband were driving in the car in the middle of town. and when we stoped for gas and cigerattes for my sisters hisband my sister pointed out about 10-15 mysterious objects hovering in one direction. at first i thought they were ballons but then i realized they were moving to fast and to "different" and when they were hovering the were very shifty. they didnt going in one direction exactly, they were moving side to side and almost tobling. i was always a believer in ufos. but i never thought i would see one and i certinly never thought i were to see more then a twelve. i was in misbelife when i saw them. my brother in law and sister were also in misbelife. we kept looking at these "objects" for about five minutes and while they were moving the started going behing a building that was in our line of sight.
content.summary: Cloudy, bubble like, moved  in one direction but shifty.

content.detailedDescription: Report ��������� 10:oopm i was walking home from a friends and seen chem trails.And no plains.Got home and i was out in my backyard smoking my cigarette. i looked to the sky and i thought i saw what i thought was a star. then it moved and it went east over the house. it then got bright looking like a  satelite dish just the tube part then it lit up like the moon. it then changed at the rear end of the craft and blasted off towards the east. and dissinagrated out of are atmissfear.
content.summary: From a big star to a satellite then was like they turned on the engs and left the atmissfear

content.detailedDescription: My husband went outside on our patio to smoke. he ran and opened the door yelling for me to come outside. he was frantic. i jumped up and came outside. as soon as i was outside i saw this huge red light in the sky. it appeared as large as a small planet but was glowing, almost as if it was on fire but it wasn't. it was traveling north to south moving very slow. it appeared to be going in a straight line. then we saw two fighter-like jets, when the jets appeared the red ball of light moved fast and seemed to be going lower and disappeared from our sight due to large trees. the jets were flying very, very fast and was not keeping up with the ball of light. i could hardly speak while i was looking at the light, my mind was racing trying to understand what i was seeing. i have never seen anything like this in my whole life. as soon as it was gone i googled "red balls of light in sky" and found this website.
content.summary: Red ball of light in sky, looked like planet, fighter jets followed shortly after we saw ball of light.

content.detailedDescription:
I've been observing these things for awhile now. i noticed they often change their lighting to deceive people. i was expecting to catch the usual activity thinking a light would turn on or off like usual. instead what happened turned out to be much more interesting. in this clip you'll see what appears to be a plane... watch closely as what we are lead to believe is a front head light or landing light changes from white to red! now it has 2 red lights! i believe this violates faa lighting regulations because there should only be one solid red light on port side (the left wing) and depending on the aircraft maybe a blinking red anti collision light on the fuselage. this is to help other pilots determine who has the right away... you can look up aircraft navigation lighting if you're interested. once it turns the front light red it slowly turns what should be the left wing tip from red to white. this is followed by the entire thing getting extremely bright. i'd love to hear mufons opinion on this one. 

i'm go to link to the youtube video even though i know they'll take it down. i've tried to upload the original raw video but mufon doesn't understand its not easy to upload 800mb of data to their site. even if it does upload the 800mb file, you'll still have a hard time playing it because its in .Mts format. i had some great sightings i caught previously but i ended up giving up submitting them because mufon makes it so difficult to upload hd video. for now you can watch it on youtube until they remove the link.

(link moved to fi report field) flg 08/16/11 10:27 cst
content.summary: Top secert aircraft/ufo violating faa regulations

content.detailedDescription: Lights that blinked orange and white and then just one solid bright light .Moved across the night sky and had no sound
content.summary: Lights  and no sound

content.detailedDescription: My wife took some panoramic photos while we were hiking the abyss lake trail, which is located within the mt. evan wilderness area. the area we were hiking in is located 8-10 miles north of grant, co off of guanella pass rd. we have a before and after photo, in which we cannot ascertain the identity of the object in one of our photos. if possible we would really like to have a second set of eyes to review the before and after photo. i can be reached @ 720-583-0569 for any further info. my wife, who is a serious skeptic of these cases has really come to question her beliefs in these matters. we are both open to any further questions. please contact us.
content.summary: Review of panoramic photo after the fact.

content.detailedDescription: on 8-14-2011 i walked outside to check on my 2 oldest boys and a friend that were playing across the street at the park. as i almost always do as a sky watcher i happened to look up as i started walking south down my driveway, just to check it out. as i did i instantly noticed a singular, extremely bright, almost auraish, white light moving across the sky in a north, northeasterly direction. not a satellite!!!!! i have seen many, many, of these over the years and this was at airplane level. not anything that i have ever seen bfore. especially considering the brightness, the abrupt flight path change to the east, northeast, absolutely no sound, and the fact that the light did not lose brightness or change as it moved off to the east out of sight.  i almost did this last night just because it`s something i have never seen before, and the boys witnessed it. so again tonight on 8-15-2011 i walked outside to the driveway to have smoke about the same time just to witness the same thing, but a little farther north this time. i did call the same son outside to witness it but he thinks i`m just over reacting to an airplane with landing-gear lights on. landing-gear lights tend to disappear as they move away from you though. anyone else see this and report similar? or any radar reports available for the area that you could check out? i have never seen this flight path in the area ether; i`ve lived here my entire life!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! searching for answers!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! thanks! or how about letting me know what type of craft flies at cesna level and doesn`t have blinking lights or make sound of any kind?
content.summary: Extremely bright, solid, white light, abrupt flight path change, no sound, no blinking lights, strange flight path!

content.detailedDescription: I came out from the building where i work to smoke a cigarette. i heard some loud birds overhead. my work is in the natomas area where there are a lot of open fields and the variety of birds are very diverse. there were two hawks flying due north overhead singing to each other when their path crossed with another hawk. (i had never seen that many hawks in one place before). they began to dive and sing. it almost looked like they were fighting. as i watched this event, out of the corner of my field of vision i noticed a bright light in the sky. it was very small, like a large, bright star. it was 11:25am so it was warm and bright outside. it was fairly high up, probably about 75 degrees to 80 degrees off the horizon. using the hawks as a measuring point it looked like it was very far off in the distance compared to the birds who were flying at about 100 ft above me and about 50 to sixty feet from my position on the ground. i could not gage its size but it was big enough for me to see it from that apparent great distance. it was bright and shone in the sky like a star, completely silent and white.  as the birds continued to fly away towards the north the object stayed completely stationary. i kept watching it and pulled out my iphone to take a picture. the object did not turn up in the photo. i was watching for about 5 minutes or so while smoking my cigarette. during this time i didn't let it out of my sight. after my cigarette had burned down it remained for a minute or two. then suddenly the star simply vanished. it didn't shoot out into space, it didn't burn out or turn off. it just simply vanished into thin air. i was excited to see it. i looked for it every chance i got to come outside all day, but alas, it was gone for good it seemed. when i walked back inside the building after the incident, i looked at my picture i had taken and it was just of the sky, that was it. nothing. i did see something. i know i saw it. why the camera couldn't see it i don't know. maybe the camera wasn't powerful enough, i had the zoom all the way up and the iphone 3gs has bad resolution at full zoom. i was excited to have seen it, but very disappointed no one else was there to see it as well, and that the picture came out horribly.
content.summary: Large bright starlike object completely stationary then vanished without a trace.

content.detailedDescription:
7:20 p.M. croswell, michigan. clear blue sky, daylight. i was sitting on my side porch with my husband, looked up and saw strange cigar shaped, ibuprofen shaped object, bright white with dark spot in the middle, at about airplane height. moved at about the same speed an airplane would. no wings. it was not an airplane. it moved in straight path and seemed to be moving farther away (growing slightly smaller). my husband grabbed binoculars and through them we saw flames coming out of one end, as if it was propelled by fire. it looked like, perhaps, a missile, although i have never seen a missile. it also looked like what i would imagine a thruster that falls off a space shuttle might look like. i saw this object in the same area, and moving in the same direction of sky where i have seen the orange yellow orbs, which i have made past reports on.
we lost sight of object when it moved past the tree line. i included a photo of sketch i made of what we saw through binoculars.
content.summary: From side porch of my home, saw airplane heighth cigar shaped, ibuprofen shaped  object, bright white, either reflecting sun or glowing. black spot in center. through binoculars could see fire coming out of one end. others also witnessed.

content.detailedDescription:
7:20 p.M. croswell, michigan. clear blue sky, daylight. i was sitting on my side porch with my husband, looked up and saw strange cigar shaped, ibuprofen shaped object, bright white with dark spot in the middle, at about airplane height. moved at about the same speed an airplane would. no wings. it was not an airplane. it moved in straight path and seemed to be moving farther away (growing slightly smaller). my husband grabbed binoculars and through them we saw flames coming out of one end, as if it was propelled by fire. it looked like, perhaps, a missile, although i have never seen a missile. it also looked like what i would imagine a thruster that falls off a space shuttle might look like. i saw this object in the same area, and moving in the same direction of sky where i have seen the orange yellow orbs, which i have made past reports on.
we lost sight of object when it moved past the tree line. i included a photo of sketch i made of what we saw through binoculars.
content.summary: From side porch of my home, saw airplane heighth cigar shaped, ibuprofen shaped  object, bright white, either reflecting sun or glowing. black spot in center. through binoculars could see fire coming out of one end. others also witnessed.

content.detailedDescription: The past couple days ive notice these starlike flying and hovering objects. iam so scared of theam cuz last night there wass big lights beamed red in the sky like i saw 4-5.They been coming out alot if they are not ufos then what are they and there are like over 50 lil ones flying around and a few big bright ones. one night my bf i where outside stargazing and right before we went in we saw this helicopter sound craft flying over my house it had no pepliers it was red in middle and green lights on side. iit was scary . i would think somebody would have notice this going on since its been more than couple days. i dont feel safe and dont know who to report this too.
content.summary: They drop from sky like stars  then fll sky w/flying star like objects for hours

content.detailedDescription:
this happened several years ago now, but i was watching "monsters and mysteries in ak" yesterday and thought it couldn't hurt to share my story. growing up in fairbanks, ak, especially living by the airport, i'm used to seeing a lot of air traffic. with a major airforce base also nearby, it's common to see and hear interesting things going on overhead. i've also seen a lot of movement late at night that i can't explain, but this particular experience is unlike any other i've ever had and has left me a believer without a shadow of a doubt. it still gives me chills to this day. 
       i had just started college at uaf and was living with my mom and dad at our family home on fairchild ave. near the fairbanks international airport. my room was on the second floor. it has a limited view of a few neighborhood houses and then a distant tree line visible. 
       i was sleeping sound when all of a sudden i was compelled to sit straight up in my bed, jerk to the left and lift the blinds. i didn't know why i was doing this and didn't even have time to think about what i was doing before i was already up and looking out the window. i was in control of my body, but it was as if someone had a very persuasive influence over me.  then i saw it. it was extremely large and hovering very low over the not so distant tree line. i can't tell exactly how big it was, but i know for sure that it was huge, at least the size of a football field. it was completely still and completely quiet except an indescribable sound that seemed to be buzzing/echoing in my head. i was virtually hypnotized by it. it was a flat metallic grey color with windows and little boxy, structural designs along the sides.  it seemed to be a more flattened triangular or trapezoidal shape, though i can't be sure because i was seeing it mostly from the side. it had little bluish/white lights lining the sides and was visible for about 10 seconds before it took off so fast that it seemed to disappear before my eyes. 
       the really chilling part about this whole experience was that while i was seeing it, i had the intense feeling that whatever it was wanted me to see it there. it knew who i was and was "looking" at me. this was no top secret military exercise. this thing had a strange, otherworldly type of influence over my mind and body. as soon as it disappeared the air came back into my bedroom. i couldn't go to sleep for a while after that because i was so overwhelmed and curious/concerned as to why it wanted me to see it there. it woke me up to do so. i know for a fact that this was not a dream and i was 100% awake and alert and freaked the hell out. i haven't seen anything like it since. i've only told a few people about this, because unless someone sees it for themselves, they will never truly believe.
content.summary: Ufo in fairbanks ak 2005

content.detailedDescription:
Two ( 2 ) diamond shaped objects viewed 8/15/2011 16:00'ish edst
first, sighted aprox. 10 miles n/ne of gwinnett county airport.
gcap reporting ceiling as broken at 6000ft. clouds appeared to move around stationary object.
second, sighted aprox. 5 miles s/sw of gwinnett county airport.
gcap reporting ceiling as broken at 6000ft. clouds appeared to move around stationary object.

both object similar in appearence. metalic with darker framework.
both highly reflected of sky/passing couds. both caused brief shadow in passing clouds...Or reflected it's shadow of passing cloud.
both visible over ga 316 and riverside, hwy 20, and hwy 120.
content.summary: 2 diamond shaped obj s to n of gcap, ga

content.detailedDescription: I was in college and my friends and i were riding in a car up in the mountains near greensburg, pa.  there had been a sighting approximately 7 miles away and had been cordoned off.  as we were driving, i felt soothing strange.  i was in the back seat and looked up through the back window when i saw an object in the sky.  it appeared to be hovering above us and following us.  the other 3 people saw the same object.  we were afraid and the driver floored the car to return back to school.  shortly after that time, the object turned 180* and disappeared into the sky.
content.summary: Saw disc-like object in sky with lights flashing around base of object.  it appeared to be following us.  when we turned the car around to leave the area, the object disappeared into the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Was fishing at the lake when we seen the light.It looked liked a star moving right at us.Slow was not moving fast no sound went over our heads looks like a triangle now its bright led looking light. it slowly moved out out of sight
content.summary: Look like a star that was moving.When it got closer to us it look liked a triangle shape made no noise
